word:
MS. 97 '02 (Copied July 8, 1902):-- 


     From the light that has been given me, the medical missionary work and the gospel ministry are never to be divorced. They are to be bound together as one work. Christ is the Head of the body--the Church, and we are to work unitedly with Him. Referring to our relation to Him, the apostle says, "We are laborers together 


                         -72A- 

with God."
